textAfterTable: 11 Songs Customer Reviews Pure Genius           by Your Uncle Fred This album and their first release are so wonderfully spacious and original - put away the cares of the world for a while, pour a cocktail, don your headphones and enjoy a brilliant musical landscape of wayward galaxies, astral surprises and lost memories. Then share the album with friends...you'll surely be the talk of the block. Now please excuse me...I must be on my way. Top Albums and Songs by Soft Hearted Scientists 1.
